name: Jorde & His Sword
description:
Jorde & His Sword is a short 3D game set in an ancient underground temple. Jorde is in search of Nova Loquentes, an ancient relic with mind control properties. Can you find it?

This game is very short and constructed quickly over Halloween weekend. I wanted to practice 3D movement controls and walking sound effects. Let me know what you think in the comments below!
